TextBlock.Text: <color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: About as ready as I'll ever be.
<color=#EAF0B4>RESEIRCHA</color>: Have you checked the targeting mechanisms?
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: Yes, I've ensured they can target any planet in the system.
<color=#EAF0B4>RESEIRCHA</color>: What is the status of the the mass condensors?
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: They are still functioning at near-perfect efficiency.
<color=#EAF0B4>RESEIRCHA</color>: Have you ensured that the self-looping warp is still calibrated? I know we had struggles with the lens, but we can't afford to--
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: <color=#EAF0B4>Reseircha</color>, before we begin, I wanted to discuss a new hypothesis.
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: Hypothesis: You worry far too much.
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: We have ensured the safety of this test countless times over. Every single potential issue has been accounted for.
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: The festival is right around the corner. Think of how much we could further the Nomai species with this discovery!
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: It's not like we're aiming to fundamentally destroy our understanding of the laws of thermodynamics here.
<color=#EAF0B4>RESEIRCHA</color>: You can never be too careful, <color=#B3E2AE>Enginell</color>. But you are correct. It is time to begin testing.
<color=#EAF0B4>RESEIRCHA</color>: Let's make our way to the lab. The valley of the northern glacier cap isn't too far a walk from here.
